comments.html:
About Netconf and Cisco Nexus, there may be some light at the end of the tunnel, because Cisco exposes the XSD schema to write XML configuration ... but ...

Netconf tools use Yang (and not XSD) to model data.

So here is a question I asked on the forum of OpenDaylight (with southbond in netconf) ... No response ... yet

https://ask.opendaylight.org/question/12986/how-to-convert-xsd-to-yang-model/
comments.name: Unknown
